page.title: 03A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: Lindsey gets up at 7.15. Her Mum dresses her. Steven gets up at 7.00. His Mum dresses him. They both have biscuits for breakfast. Lindsey drinks coffee and Steven drinks squash. At 7.50 Lindsey's taxi comes, it picks her up outside her house. Steven's taxi comes at 8.00. Lindsey picks up 4 other{handicapped}children and Steven 3 other handicapped children. Lindsey comes from{Leominster,}Steven from {Ross.} Lindsey gets home at 3.55 just when her Dad comes home. Steven gets home at 4 p.m. They both go to bed at 8 p.m. Sometimes Dad puts Lindsey to bed and sometimes Mum. Dad always puts Steven to bed. Lindsey and Steven are different from most of the other children in their school - they are physically handicap- ped & spend their days in{wheelchairs.
